channel.title: Can someone help me edit Ice Barrage?
channel.description: Ice barrage needs 125 Magic. But I lowered it to 94, and compiled, and it isn't working still. 'You need the magic level of 125 to cast this spell' =[ I don't know what I'm doing wrong?

item.title: Can someone help me edit Ice Barrage?
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -94 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0);
//hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
//stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me edit Ice Barrage?
